All Classes

Class
Description
CommonEventListener
 
DataManager
 
MiniGame
MiniGame class of all minigames
- Custom minigame frame can be made with extending this class
- Message only send to same minigame players
MiniGameAccessor
MiniGameWorld plugin "MiniGame" wrapper api
MiniGameCommand
 
MiniGameCommandTabCompleter
 
MiniGameCustomOption
Below custom options are created in `custom-data` section by default
Must serialize/deserialize value of each options in get(), set() method
MiniGameCustomOption.Option
 
MiniGameDataManager
 
MiniGameEventDetector
Event detector to send Minigames

[IMPORTANT]
Detectable event means can get player from "Default event list" or "Detailed event list"

[Default Event List]
- PlayerEvent
- EntityEvent
- HangingEvent
- InventoryEvent
- InventoryMoveItemEvent
- PlayerLeashEntityEvent
- TabCompleteEvent

[Detailed Event list]
- Some of BlockEvent
- Some of EntityEvent
- Some of VehicleEvent
MiniGameEventExternalDetector
Custom event external detector
MiniGameEventListener
 
MiniGameEventPassEvent
Called when a event passed to a started minigame
[IMPORTANT] minigame will process event in last
[IMPORTANT] only synchronous events will be passed
MiniGameExceptionEvent
Called when a exception related minigame has occurred
[IMPORTANT] This event is passed to a only minigame which is passed with argument in this constructorMiniGameExceptionEvent(MiniGame, String)
[IMPORTANT] Other plugin has to call this event to pass exception to a minigame

MiniGameFinishEvent
Called when a minigame finished
[IMPORTANT] players are already out of the minigame
MiniGameHelpCommand
 
MiniGameManager
 
MiniGameMenu
[IMPORTANT]
- (Only for MiniGameWorld) Menu icon must be executed with command, because of command permission (Join-Game menu = make player run "/minigame join <title>")
MiniGameMenuManager
 
MiniGameMinigamesConfigCommand
 
MiniGameObserver
MiniGame timing observer
- Usage: 3rd-party wiki
MiniGamePartyCommand
 
MiniGamePlayerData
Player data with score, live
[IMPORTANT] live is only valid in the minigame play (not related with player's health)
MiniGamePlayerEvent
Playing minigame player event
MiniGamePlayerExceptionEvent
Called when a player playing minigame exception has occured

Defined reason
player-quit-server: when a player quit the server
MiniGamePlayerJoinEvent
Called when a player try to join a minigame
MiniGamePlayerLeaveEvent
Called when a player try to leave a minigame
MiniGamePlayerState
Manage player's everything
- When join the game: save state and make pure state
- When quit the game: restore saved state
[IMPORATNT]
- If add a element, check that affects to viewer MiniGameViewManager
MiniGamePlayerUnviewEvent
Called when a player try to unview a minigame
MiniGamePlayerViewEvent
Called when a player try to view a minigame
MiniGamePlayScoreboard
 
MiniGameRankResult
Interface for rank data
MiniGameScoreboardManager
Scoreboard manager
- Waiting scoreboard
- Play scoreboard

Manage only one scoreboard instance
MiniGameScoreboardManager.ScoreboardType
Current scoreboard type
MiniGameScoreboardSidebarUpdater
 
MiniGameScoreboardUpdateEvent
Called when a scoreboard of minigame is updated
MiniGameScoreboardUpdater
 
MiniGameServerExceptionEvent
Called when a server exception has occured
[IMPORTANT] all minigames will be finished
MiniGameSetting
If create option
- Add getter and setter

Also if file control is true
- Add option in MiniGameSetting.getFileSetting() and MiniGameSetting.setFileSetting(Map)
- Add access method to MiniGameMinigamesConfigCommand
MiniGameSetting.GameFinishCondition
Check game finish condition
MiniGameSettingsConfigCommand
 
MiniGameStartEvent
Called when a minigame starts

Party
Party which manage members, invitees, askers
PartyManager
[Party System]
- All member have equal permission (i.e.
PartyMember
Party member which have data related with party
Setting
 
SoloBattleMiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame several players can battle individually
- min player count: 2 or more

[Rule]
- nothing
SoloMiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame only 1 player can play
- solo play
- min player count: 1
- solo util methods

[Rule]
- nothing
TeamBattleMiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame players battle with each teams
- min team count: 2 or more
- all teams have the same score
- team util class, methods

[Custom Option]
- group-chat: If true, send message only to team members (default: true)
- team-pvp: If true, team members can not attack each other(pvp option have to be set to true), (default: true)
- team-size: Related with MiniGameSetting.getMaxPlayerCount(), if "max-player-count" is 12 and "team-size" is 4 then, 3 teams are created automatically

[Team Register Mode]
- Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
- See TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode

[Rule]
- Create Teams with createTeams()
- When use initGameSettings(), must call super.initGameSettings()
- If need different team types, override TeamBattleMiniGame.createTeams() without "super.createTeams()" and create custom teams (e.g.
TeamBattleMiniGame.TeamRegisterMode
Team register mode
- Participants divied into teams when game starts with mode
- If use TeamRegisterMode.NONE, should register players to team with registerPlayersToTeam()

[Team Register Mode]
- NONE, FAIR, FILL, FAIR_FILL, RANDOM or can divide overriding "registerPlayersToTeam()"

- e.g.
TeamBattleMiniGameScoreboardUpdater
 
TeamMiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame players cooperate with each other
- min player count: 1 or more
- all players have the same score
- team util methods
[Rule]
- must use "plusEveryoneScore()" or "minusEveryoneScore()" for team score
TeamMiniGameScoreboardUpdater
 
Utils
 
VersionChecker
 
VersionChecker.Different
